title: What's Wrong With You?
description: A comprehensive diagnostic test to determine your primary cosmic affliction. Please answer honestly for accurate results.

OUTCOME_PARANOIA.title: Diagnosis: Chronic Cosmic Paranoia
OUTCOME_PARANOIA.description: You see conspiracies in the alignment of the stars and believe the cosmic background radiation is whispering your name. Every shadow is a lurking horror, every asteroid a potential assassin. You are convinced the universe is not just indifferent, but actively out to get you. This is, of course, completely true, but you're not supposed to know that.

OUTCOME_AGGRESSION.title: Diagnosis: Hyper-Aggressive Star-Rage
OUTCOME_AGGRESSION.description: Your solution to most problems is to apply overwhelming force. You've tried to headbutt a black hole and once declared war on a nebula for looking at you funny. Your fight-or-flight response is stuck on 'fight,' and you're pretty sure 'flight' is for cowards and birds. You are a hammer, and to you, every celestial body is a nail.

OUTCOME_DELUSION.title: Diagnosis: Grandiose Reality Delusion
OUTCOME_DELUSION.description: You believe you are the chosen one, the protagonist of reality, and that all events revolve around you. You are convinced you can communicate with sentient snack foods and that you are destined to rule the galaxy from a throne made of crystallized time. Your confidence is inspiring, but your grasp on objective reality has long since left the building.

OUTCOME_DEFAULT.title: Diagnosis: Inconclusive
OUTCOME_DEFAULT.description: Your answers are a chaotic mix of conflicting impulses. You are an enigma, a puzzle box of cosmic weirdness. We cannot determine what's wrong with you because it seems EVERYTHING is wrong with you, all at once. Congratulations, you have broken our diagnostic tool. Please report to the nearest reality calibration center.

OUTCOME_APATHY.title: Diagnosis: Terminal Cosmic Indifference
OUTCOME_APATHY.description: You've achieved a state of such profound apathy that entropy itself is jealous. Heat death of the universe? Shrug. Galactic collision? Whatever. You once watched your own planet explode and your only response was 'meh.' Your emotional range spans from 'slightly bored' to 'moderately unimpressed.' Even existential dread finds you too boring to bother with.

OUTCOME_OBSESSION.title: Diagnosis: Hyper-Fixation Reality Syndrome
OUTCOME_OBSESSION.description: You have become obsessively fixated on cataloging the exact number of photons emitted by dying stars. Your apartment is wallpapered with calculations, and you've named each individual cosmic ray that passes through your body. You believe that if you stop counting for even a moment, the universe will forget how to exist. Spoiler alert: it won't.

OUTCOME_NOSTALGIA.title: Diagnosis: Chronic Temporal Displacement Disorder
OUTCOME_NOSTALGIA.description: You are perpetually homesick for a time that never existed and a place that was never real. You spend your days pining for the 'good old days' of the Big Bang, when everything was simple, hot, and dense. You've convinced yourself that quarks had more personality back then, and don't get you started on how much better neutron stars used to taste.

OUTCOME_PERFECTIONISM.title: Diagnosis: Impossible Standards Cosmic Neurosis
OUTCOME_PERFECTIONISM.description: You are dissatisfied with the fundamental constants of physics because they're not quite round enough. You've spent decades trying to file down the edges of Pi to make it a nice, clean 3. Every sunset disappoints you because it's not geometrically perfect, and you once filed a complaint with the universe because gravity isn't strong enough. Reality has restraining orders against you.

OUTCOME_PROCRASTINATION.title: Diagnosis: Infinite Delay Temporal Loop
OUTCOME_PROCRASTINATION.description: You have been meaning to start your life for approximately 47 years now, but keep putting it off until you finish organizing your collection of interstellar dust particles. Your motto is 'I'll deal with existential dread tomorrow,' but tomorrow never comes because you're too busy rearranging it. Time itself has given up waiting for you.

OUTCOME_HYPOCHONDRIA.title: Diagnosis: Universal Disease Anxiety Syndrome
OUTCOME_HYPOCHONDRIA.description: You are convinced you have contracted every known illness in the galaxy, including several that don't exist yet. You believe you're allergic to dark matter and that your symptoms of cosmic radiation poisoning are being caused by thinking too hard about neutrons. WebMD has blocked your IP address, and even imaginary diseases avoid you because you're too clingy.

OUTCOME_HOARDING.title: Diagnosis: Compulsive Cosmic Collection Disorder
OUTCOME_HOARDING.description: You have been saving every photon that has ever touched your retina because 'you never know when you might need them.' Your home is filled with bottled starlight, fossilized comet tails, and a growing collection of expired quarks. You refuse to throw away yesterday because it might be vintage someday. Even black holes are jealous of your ability to accumulate stuff.

OUTCOME_INSOMNIA.title: Diagnosis: Eternal Vigilance Disorder
OUTCOME_INSOMNIA.description: You haven't slept in 847 days because you're afraid you'll miss something important, like the heat death of the universe. You've convinced yourself that consciousness is the only thing keeping reality stable, so if you fall asleep, everything will disappear. Spoiler alert: the universe managed just fine for 13.8 billion years before you showed up.

OUTCOME_NARCISSISM.title: Diagnosis: Universal Protagonist Complex
OUTCOME_NARCISSISM.description: You are absolutely certain that you are the main character of existence and everyone else is just a poorly written NPC. You believe the cosmic microwave background radiation is actually just the universe's way of playing your theme song on repeat. You've trademarked your own DNA sequence and charge royalties when other people breathe your air. Reality has filed several harassment complaints against you.

OUTCOME_PESSIMISM.title: Diagnosis: Catastrophic Inevitability Syndrome
OUTCOME_PESSIMISM.description: You wake up every morning disappointed that the universe still exists because it's just prolonging the inevitable heat death. You see every sunrise as just another day closer to cosmic entropy, and you've pre-written obituaries for every star in the galaxy. Your glass isn't half empty‚Äîit's completely empty and probably made of dark matter anyway.

OUTCOME_OPTIMISM.title: Diagnosis: Delusional Positivity Disorder
OUTCOME_OPTIMISM.description: You believe that the heat death of the universe is actually just the universe's way of redecorating for a surprise party. Every black hole is a portal to somewhere fun, and you're convinced that entropy is just matter playing hard-to-get. Your relentless cheerfulness has caused three separate reality breakdowns and one minor existential crisis in the space-time continuum.

OUTCOME_ANXIETY.title: Diagnosis: Omnipresent Worry Amplification Syndrome
OUTCOME_ANXIETY.description: You are simultaneously worried about everything that has happened, is happening, will happen, and might happen in parallel universes you've never heard of. Your anxiety has achieved quantum entanglement with cosmic dread, creating a feedback loop of worry that scientists use to calibrate their instruments. You've given anxiety about your anxiety, and that anxiety has anxiety too.

OUTCOME_ARROGANCE.title: Diagnosis: Superiority Complex Galactic Overdose
OUTCOME_ARROGANCE.description: You believe you're so intellectually superior that you've started correcting the laws of physics during casual conversation. You once sent a strongly worded letter to Einstein about his 'obviously flawed' theory of relativity, and you're pretty sure you could do a better job running the universe if someone would just give you the chance. Gravity itself rolls its eyes when you walk by.

OUTCOME_ENVY.title: Diagnosis: Cosmic Jealousy Radiation Poisoning
OUTCOME_ENVY.description: You are jealous of black holes because they get to consume everything they touch, and you're envious of photons because they travel at the speed of light. You spent last week resenting quarks for their strong nuclear force, and you've been bitter about not being a gas giant since childhood. Even your own shadow gets more attention than you do, which makes you hate it.

OUTCOME_GLUTTONY.title: Diagnosis: Universal Consumption Disorder
OUTCOME_GLUTTONY.description: You have an insatiable appetite for literally everything in existence. You've eaten three moons, two asteroid belts, and once tried to take a bite out of the concept of infinity. Your hunger is so vast that you've been classified as a competing force against entropy. The universe has started hiding snacks from you, but you keep finding them anyway.

OUTCOME_GREED.title: Diagnosis: Infinite Acquisition Syndrome
OUTCOME_GREED.description: You want to own every atom in the universe and have started a monopoly on the color blue. You've been buying stars in bulk and hoarding gravity because you heard it might be valuable someday. Your net worth is calculated in entire solar systems, but you're still not satisfied because someone else owns all the dark matter. You make dragons look generous.

OUTCOME_LUST.title: Diagnosis: Inappropriate Cosmic Attraction Disorder
OUTCOME_LUST.description: You have developed romantic feelings for the abstract concept of mathematics and have been sending love letters to the Fibonacci sequence. You find black holes 'mysteriously attractive' and once tried to seduce the aurora borealis. Your dating profile lists 'long walks on the beach' but by beach you mean 'the event horizon of dying stars.'

OUTCOME_PRIDE.title: Diagnosis: Galactic Ego Expansion Syndrome
OUTCOME_PRIDE.description: Your sense of self-importance has grown so large that it now has its own gravitational field. You believe your opinions are so valuable that you've started charging admission for people to hear your thoughts. You once tried to patent your own existence and sent a cease-and-desist letter to everyone else in the universe for copyright infringement of being alive.

OUTCOME_SLOTH.title: Diagnosis: Motivational Entropy Overdose
OUTCOME_SLOTH.description: You have achieved such a profound state of inertia that you make black holes look energetic. You've been sitting in the same chair for so long that you've become geologically significant. Your laziness is so complete that you've trained your thoughts to think themselves, and you're too lazy to blink so you've hired someone to do it for you.

OUTCOME_WRATH.title: Diagnosis: Universal Rage Amplification Disorder
OUTCOME_WRATH.description: Your anger has reached such cosmic proportions that it's been classified as a new form of dark energy. You once got so mad at a star that it went supernova just to escape your fury. Your temper tantrums have been known to alter the rotation of nearby planets, and you're personally responsible for at least three minor ice ages. Even hurricanes are afraid of your mood swings.

OUTCOME_DENIAL.title: Diagnosis: Reality Rejection Syndrome
OUTCOME_DENIAL.description: You refuse to acknowledge that existence exists and have convinced yourself that consciousness is just a myth perpetuated by the awake. You believe that the universe is actually just an elaborate practical joke being played on you by interdimensional entities with too much time on their hands. You've been living in denial for so long that denial has started charging you rent.

OUTCOME_NIHILISM.title: Diagnosis: Meaninglessness Amplification Disorder
OUTCOME_NIHILISM.description: You have embraced the void so completely that the void has started sending you Christmas cards. You believe that nothing matters so much that your nothing matters more than everyone else's nothing. You've written a 800-page manifesto on the importance of unimportance, which defeats the purpose, but you're too nihilistic to care about the contradiction.

OUTCOME_MASOCHISM.title: Diagnosis: Cosmic Self-Punishment Compulsion
OUTCOME_MASOCHISM.description: You derive pleasure from the inevitable heat death of the universe and have started a collection of painful existential truths. You enjoy contemplating your own mortality so much that you've scheduled regular appointments with dread. You find suffering so delightful that suffering has filed a restraining order against you for being too clingy.

OUTCOME_SADISM.title: Diagnosis: Universal Cruelty Enhancement Syndrome
OUTCOME_SADISM.description: You enjoy watching stars die so much that you've started a subscription service to witness supernovas in real-time. You take pleasure in the fact that everything beautiful is temporary, and you've been known to laugh maniacally during documentaries about entropy. Even cosmic horror is disturbed by your level of enthusiasm for universal suffering.

OUTCOME_ATTACHMENT.title: Diagnosis: Emotional Hoarding Disorder
OUTCOME_ATTACHMENT.description: You are so emotionally attached to every moment that you refuse to let time pass. You've been trying to preserve yesterday in formaldehyde and have started a museum of expired feelings. Your attachment to material possessions is so strong that your belongings have developed separation anxiety when you leave the house. You make superglue look commitment-phobic.

OUTCOME_DETACHMENT.title: Diagnosis: Emotional Void Syndrome
OUTCOME_DETACHMENT.description: You have become so detached from reality that reality has started leaving you passive-aggressive notes asking if you're still interested in participating. Your emotional range consists entirely of variations of 'mild indifference,' and you view the suffering of others as mildly interesting background noise. You make sociopaths seem emotionally expressive.

OUTCOME_CONTROL.title: Diagnosis: Universal Micromanagement Disorder
OUTCOME_CONTROL.description: You believe you need to personally supervise every quantum interaction in the universe to make sure particles are behaving properly. You've been sending strongly worded emails to the laws of physics about their inconsistent enforcement, and you once tried to reorganize the periodic table alphabetically. Your need for control is so intense that chaos theory was invented specifically to annoy you.

OUTCOME_CHAOS.title: Diagnosis: Entropy Acceleration Syndrome
OUTCOME_CHAOS.description: You actively work to increase disorder in the universe because you find organization aesthetically offensive. Your presence causes spontaneous randomization of nearby matter, and you've been banned from several libraries for reorganizing books into chaotic piles. You believe that entropy isn't happening fast enough, so you've appointed yourself as its personal assistant.

OUTCOME_ISOLATION.title: Diagnosis: Voluntary Hermit Syndrome
OUTCOME_ISOLATION.description: You have withdrawn from society so completely that society occasionally forgets you exist and has to be reminded to include you in census data. You communicate exclusively through interpretive dance performed for an audience of houseplants, and you've trained pigeons to deliver your grocery list because human interaction is too overwhelming. You make antisocial personality disorder look gregarious.

OUTCOME_CODEPENDENCY.title: Diagnosis: Universal Approval Addiction
OUTCOME_CODEPENDENCY.description: You need constant validation from every conscious entity in the universe, including your own thoughts. You've been asking strangers for permission to breathe, and you won't make any decisions without consulting a focus group of at least 47 people. Your need for approval is so intense that you've started seeking validation from inanimate objects, and your toaster is getting tired of your neediness.

OUTCOME_REBELLION.title: Diagnosis: Authority Rejection Compulsion
OUTCOME_REBELLION.description: You rebel against everything, including your own rebellious impulses, creating a paradoxical loop of anti-establishment establishment. You once started a protest against protests, and you refuse to follow your own advice out of principle. Your rebellious nature is so comprehensive that you've begun rebelling against the concept of rebellion itself, which confuses even you.

OUTCOME_CONFORMITY.title: Diagnosis: Individuality Suppression Syndrome
OUTCOME_CONFORMITY.description: You have molded yourself so perfectly to fit societal expectations that you've essentially become a human-shaped hole in reality. Your personality is so generic that personality tests can't detect you, and you've been mistaken for wallpaper on seventeen separate occasions. You make beige paint look distinctive and memorable.

OUTCOME_IMPATIENCE.title: Diagnosis: Temporal Acceleration Disorder
OUTCOME_IMPATIENCE.description: You are so impatient that you've been trying to speed up the expansion of the universe by pushing against spacetime with your bare hands. You get frustrated waiting for light to travel and have filed several complaints with physics about the 'unnecessarily slow' speed limit of causality. You make hummingbirds look lethargic and contemplative.

OUTCOME_PATIENCE.title: Diagnosis: Infinite Waiting Syndrome
OUTCOME_PATIENCE.description: You are so patient that you've been waiting for the universe to end so you can see what happens next. You spent 200 years in a doctor's waiting room before realizing the doctor had died decades ago. Your patience is so extreme that time itself gets bored waiting for you to get impatient. You make geological processes seem hasty.

OUTCOME_CURIOSITY.title: Diagnosis: Compulsive Investigation Disorder
OUTCOME_CURIOSITY.description: Your curiosity is so intense that you've been conducting unauthorized experiments on the fabric of reality to see what makes it tick. You've been asking 'but why?' so frequently that the universe has started responding with increasingly sarcastic answers. Your need to know everything has become so overwhelming that knowledge itself has started hiding from you.

OUTCOME_INDIFFERENCE.title: Diagnosis: Universal Disinterest Syndrome
OUTCOME_INDIFFERENCE.description: You find everything so boring that boredom itself has become bored with you. Your indifference is so profound that it's created a new form of emotional vacuum that scientists are studying for its potential applications in entropy research. You make apathy look passionate and engaged.

OUTCOME_JEALOUSY.title: Diagnosis: Comparative Suffering Disorder
OUTCOME_JEALOUSY.description: You are jealous of everyone for everything, including their problems, which makes you jealous of your own jealousy. You envy people with terminal illnesses because they get more attention, and you're bitter about not having any good traumatic backstories to share at parties. Your jealousy has become so meta that you're now jealous of people who aren't jealous.

OUTCOME_GUILT.title: Diagnosis: Omnipresent Responsibility Syndrome
OUTCOME_GUILT.description: You feel personally responsible for every negative event that has ever occurred in the universe, including the heat death that hasn't happened yet. You've been apologizing to strangers for crimes they committed, and you feel guilty about feeling guilty because feeling bad makes other people feel bad. Your guilt is so comprehensive that it's started feeling guilty about itself.

OUTCOME_SHAME.title: Diagnosis: Existential Embarrassment Disorder
OUTCOME_SHAME.description: You are so ashamed of existing that you've been trying to apologize to the universe for taking up space. You feel embarrassed about having thoughts because thinking seems presumptuous, and you've been hiding from your own reflection because making eye contact with yourself is too awkward. You make social anxiety look confident and outgoing.

OUTCOME_DISGUST.title: Diagnosis: Universal Revulsion Amplification
OUTCOME_DISGUST.description: You find everything in existence so repulsive that existence has started questioning its life choices. You're disgusted by the concept of concepts, and you find your own disgust disgusting, creating an infinite loop of revulsion. Your standards are so high that perfection itself doesn't meet your minimum requirements for acceptability.

OUTCOME_SURPRISE.title: Diagnosis: Perpetual Astonishment Syndrome
OUTCOME_SURPRISE.description: You are constantly surprised by the fact that reality continues to exist, and you're amazed every time gravity works as expected. You've been gasping in wonder at your own ability to breathe for the past six months, and you're perpetually startled by your own thoughts. Your capacity for surprise is so great that predictability has become unpredictable around you.

OUTCOME_ANTICIPATION.title: Diagnosis: Future-Focused Temporal Displacement
OUTCOME_ANTICIPATION.description: You spend so much time anticipating future events that you've forgotten how to exist in the present moment. You're currently excited about being excited about something that might happen next century, and you've been looking forward to your own death since childhood. Your anticipation is so intense that the future has filed a restraining order against you.

OUTCOME_REGRET.title: Diagnosis: Temporal Remorse Accumulation Disorder
OUTCOME_REGRET.description: You regret every decision you've ever made, including the decision to regret your decisions. You've been composing apology letters to your past self and feel bad about choices you haven't made yet. Your regret is so comprehensive that you've started regretting things that happened to other people in parallel universes you've never visited.

OUTCOME_HOPE.title: Diagnosis: Irrational Optimism Reality Distortion
OUTCOME_HOPE.description: You maintain hope in the face of overwhelming evidence that hope is statistically insignificant. You believe that entropy is just going through a phase and that heat death is actually the universe's way of preparing for a surprise birthday party. Your hope is so persistent that despair has given up trying to discourage you and has started taking lessons from your dedication.

OUTCOME_FEAR.title: Diagnosis: Omniphobic Existential Terror
OUTCOME_FEAR.description: You are afraid of everything, including your own fear, which creates a recursive loop of terror that terrifies you further. You're scared of being scared of being scared, and you've developed phobias of phobias. Your fear is so comprehensive that courage has started avoiding you because it finds your level of terror emotionally exhausting.

OUTCOME_CONFUSION.title: Diagnosis: Persistent Cognitive Bewilderment
OUTCOME_CONFUSION.description: You are so confused by existence that confusion has become confused about whether it should be confused. You understand nothing so thoroughly that your lack of understanding has achieved a zen-like clarity that confuses you even more. You've been asking 'what?' so often that question marks have started avoiding your sentences out of embarrassment.

OUTCOME_CERTAINTY.title: Diagnosis: Absolute Knowledge Delusion Syndrome
OUTCOME_CERTAINTY.description: You are absolutely certain about everything, including things that don't exist and facts that contradict each other. Your certainty is so complete that doubt has started doubting itself, and you've convinced uncertainty that it might be wrong about being uncertain. You believe in your beliefs so strongly that belief itself is considering retirement.

OUTCOME_BOREDOM.title: Diagnosis: Chronic Understimulation Reality Syndrome
OUTCOME_BOREDOM.description: You find the entire universe so boring that you've started a petition to request a more interesting existence. You've watched every possible event that could happen and found them all disappointingly predictable. Your boredom is so profound that it's become interesting, which bores you, which makes it interesting again, creating an infinite loop of tedious fascination.

OUTCOME_EXCITEMENT.title: Diagnosis: Perpetual Stimulation Overdose
OUTCOME_EXCITEMENT.description: You find everything so exciting that your excitement has achieved critical mass and threatens to collapse into a black hole of pure enthusiasm. You get thrilled by watching paint dry because the molecules are doing such interesting things, and you've been known to applaud the sunrise for its consistent daily performance. Your excitement is so intense that calm has started taking anxiety medication.

q1.text: You wake up to find that your reflection is missing from all mirrors, but you can still see yourself in photos and videos. Your first reaction is to...

options.text: Check every reflective surface in your house to map the exact scope of this phenomenon.
Assume vampires are real and you've somehow become one overnight.
Immediately suspect this is part of some elaborate government experiment.
Feel mildly annoyed that you can't check your hair before work.
Get excited about the unique metaphysical implications of selective reflection.

q2_reflection_obsession.text: After checking 47 different reflective surfaces, you discover the phenomenon is completely consistent. Every mirror shows nothing, but phone cameras still capture your image. What's your next investigative step?

options.text: Create a detailed spreadsheet documenting the reflective properties of every surface in your home.
Start testing different wavelengths of light to see if you reflect in infrared or UV.
Begin measuring the exact angle and lighting conditions under which this occurs.
Test whether other people can see your reflection when you cannot.

q2_vampire_assumption.text: You're obviously a vampire now. Time to embrace your new undead existence. What's your first vampiric priority?

options.text: Start researching vampire lore to understand your new powers and limitations.
Feel excited about joining the ranks of immortal creatures of the night.
Begin planning your new identity as a sophisticated creature of darkness.
Worry about all the inconveniences of vampiric existence.

q2_government_conspiracy.text: This is clearly government experimentation. They've probably been dosing your water supply with experimental compounds. How do you gather evidence?

options.text: Start documenting everything - your symptoms, timing, potential exposure sources.
Begin searching for other people experiencing similar phenomena.
Install surveillance equipment to monitor who might be watching you.
Feel angry that they would experiment on innocent citizens like yourself.

q2_hair_annoyance.text: This is moderately inconvenient for your morning routine, but you've dealt with worse. How do you adapt?

options.text: Set up your phone camera as a makeshift mirror and get on with your day.
Just go to work looking however you look. It's not like it really matters.
Ask your neighbor to tell you if your hair looks okay before leaving.
Put off dealing with it until later. Maybe it'll fix itself.

q2_metaphysical_excitement.text: This is fascinating! You're experiencing a phenomenon that challenges our understanding of light, reflection, and possibly consciousness itself. Where do you start your investigation?

options.text: Begin researching the physics of reflection and whether consciousness affects electromagnetic properties.
Start a detailed journal documenting every aspect of this experience.
Contact local universities to see if any scientists would be interested in studying you.
Begin meditating to see if this is connected to some kind of spiritual awakening.

q3_surface_cataloging.text: Your spreadsheet now contains detailed data on 237 reflective surfaces, from bathroom mirrors to puddles to polished spoons. The pattern holds: you appear in none of them. This level of consistency is either reassuring or terrifying. You decide it's...

options.text: Reassuring. Consistent patterns mean you can predict and control the phenomenon.
Terrifying. This level of systematic change to reality suggests something fundamental has shifted.
Fascinating. You need to expand your data collection to include non-reflective surfaces for comparison.
Proof that you're methodologically superior to anyone else who might experience this.

q3_spectrum_analysis.text: Using borrowed lab equipment, you discover something incredible: you DO reflect in infrared and ultraviolet, but not in visible light. Your reflection exists, but human eyes can't see it. This discovery makes you feel...

options.text: Like you've uncovered a fundamental truth about the nature of consciousness and perception.
Curious about what other invisible changes might be happening to your body.
Worried that this might be just the beginning of a more comprehensive disappearance.
Excited to be the first person to document this unprecedented phenomenon.

q3_precision_measurement.text: After days of meticulous testing, you've determined that the phenomenon occurs regardless of lighting angle, mirror quality, surface material, or time of day. The precision of this impossibility is somehow the most disturbing part. You decide to...

options.text: Create even more precise measurements to find the underlying mathematical principle.
Feel satisfied that you've achieved scientific rigor in documenting the impossible.
Start testing other people to see if this phenomenon affects anyone else.
Begin obsessing over what other physical laws might be changing without your knowledge.

q3_social_verification.text: You ask three different people to look in a mirror with you. They all insist they can see your reflection perfectly clearly, exactly where it should be. Either they're lying, or you're the only one who can't see it. This realization makes you...

options.text: Deeply anxious about your grip on reality and what else you might be missing.
Suspicious that they're all part of whatever conspiracy is affecting you.
Fascinated by the selective nature of this perceptual phenomenon.
Isolated and alone, realizing you're experiencing something no one else can understand.

q3_vampire_research.text: Your research reveals that vampires should have many other symptoms you don't have: sunlight sensitivity, blood cravings, immortality, superhuman strength. You only have the mirror issue. This makes you conclude that...

options.text: You're obviously a very specialized type of vampire with unique characteristics.
The vampire theory was wrong and you need to research other supernatural possibilities.
Maybe you're becoming a vampire gradually and the other symptoms will develop over time.
This proves you're even more special than regular vampires.

q3_vampire_enthusiasm.text: You spend the day planning your new vampiric lifestyle: sleeping during the day, developing a mysterious persona, maybe getting a cape. By evening, you realize you haven't experienced any other vampiric symptoms, but you decide...

options.text: This is still the best thing that's ever happened to you, even if it's not traditional vampirism.
You should give it more time - maybe the other powers will manifest soon.
To embrace whatever you're becoming, even if it's not exactly what you expected.
You're disappointed that reality isn't living up to your supernatural expectations.

q3_vampire_identity.text: You've crafted an elaborate backstory about your ancient vampiric lineage and mysterious powers. You practice dramatic poses and invest in a black wardrobe. When people ask about your 'transformation,' you...

options.text: Speak in riddles about the burden of immortality and the curse of eternal night.
Begin believing your own fictional backstory because it feels more real than your actual life.
Feel proud of how sophisticated and mysterious you've become.
Start looking down on ordinary humans and their mundane concerns.

q3_vampire_concerns.text: You spend the day worrying about vampiric problems: What if you accidentally hurt someone? What if vampire hunters exist? What if you need to drink blood but you're vegetarian? These anxieties are consuming your thoughts, so you decide to...

options.text: Research every possible danger and complication of vampiric existence.
Start avoiding people entirely until you understand your new nature.
Create detailed safety protocols for interacting with humans.
Feel guilty about the potential harm you might cause to innocent people.

q3_evidence_collection.text: Your documentation efforts have produced 847 pages of notes, 23 spreadsheets, and 156 photographs. You've tracked patterns in your water consumption, sleep cycles, and mirror exposure. The sheer volume of data is overwhelming, but you're convinced it contains the key to understanding the conspiracy. Your next step is to...

options.text: Organize all this data into cross-referenced databases to identify hidden patterns.
Send copies of your evidence to journalists and whistleblower websites.
Feel proud that you've been more thorough than any government investigator would be.
Start looking for experts who might be able to analyze your findings.

q3_victim_network.text: After weeks of searching online forums and social media, you've found three other people claiming similar experiences. They describe various phenomena: missing shadows, photographs that don't develop properly, security cameras that can't see them. You realize you may have discovered a larger pattern, which makes you feel...

options.text: Relieved that you're not alone and there are others who understand your experience.
Terrified by the scope of whatever experiment or phenomenon is affecting multiple people.
Excited to be part of documenting a previously unknown phenomenon.
Suspicious that these people might be government plants designed to mislead you.

q3_counter_surveillance.text: Your home security system now includes 12 cameras, motion detectors, and electromagnetic field monitors. After two weeks of recording, you've captured something disturbing: there are brief moments where your equipment malfunctions whenever you approach mirrors. This evidence suggests...

options.text: You're being specifically targeted by technology that interferes with recording equipment.
You need even more sophisticated monitoring equipment to capture what's happening.
The phenomenon itself somehow affects electronic devices in your vicinity.
You should feel proud that you've detected something others would have missed.

q3_righteous_fury.text: Your anger at being an unwilling test subject has been building for days. The violation of your autonomy and privacy is unforgivable. You decide that the appropriate response is to...

options.text: Channel your rage into exposing this conspiracy and protecting other potential victims.
Begin planning legal action against whoever is responsible for this experimentation.
Feel energized by your righteous anger and use it to fuel your investigation.
Start looking for ways to fight back against the people doing this to you.

q3_practical_solution.text: Your phone-camera mirror system works perfectly well for daily grooming needs. You've adapted your routine and honestly, it's not that different from before. This practical approach makes you feel...

options.text: Satisfied that you can adapt to strange circumstances without drama.
Proud of your pragmatic problem-solving skills.
Like this experience has taught you something valuable about flexibility.
Curious about what other adaptations you might need to make.

q3_appearance_indifference.text: You go to work without checking your appearance. Surprisingly, no one seems to notice anything different about how you look. This confirms your suspicion that...

options.text: Most concerns about appearance are overblown and no one really cares anyway.
You've been wasting too much time on vanity when it doesn't actually matter.
People are too self-absorbed to notice other people's problems.
This whole mirror thing might be even less important than you thought.

q3_neighbor_dependency.text: Your neighbor, Mrs. Chen, is happy to help with daily appearance checks. She's become an essential part of your morning routine, and you find yourself needing her approval for more and more decisions. This growing dependency makes you feel...

options.text: Grateful to have someone you can rely on during this strange time.
Concerned that you're becoming too reliant on other people's judgment.
Like you should expand your support network to include more people.
Embarrassed about needing help with something so basic.

q4_growth_mindset.text: Your positive interpretation of this experience as a learning opportunity has generalized into an optimistic worldview where challenges are opportunities for development and strange experiences are chances to expand your capabilities. You now approach problems with curiosity rather than anxiety. This shift in perspective makes you feel...

options.text: Excited about what other growth opportunities might be disguised as problems in your life.
Grateful for the wisdom and resilience you've developed through this experience.
Confident that you can handle whatever other unusual circumstances life might present.
Curious about what other aspects of your life might benefit from this growth-oriented approach.

q4_help_shame.text: Your embarrassment about needing assistance with something as basic as determining what you look like has evolved into a deeper shame about your general inability to handle life independently. You feel like you should be more self-sufficient, and requiring other people's help feels like evidence of personal inadequacy. This shame makes you want to...

options.text: Withdraw from situations where you might need help to avoid further embarrassment.
Overcompensate by trying to help everyone else so you feel less indebted.
Work harder to develop complete self-reliance so you never need anyone's assistance again.
Become more critical of yourself for having normal human limitations and needs.

q4_historical_preservation.text: Your documentation efforts have taken on an almost archaeological quality as you work to preserve every detail of this historically unprecedented phenomenon for future generations. You imagine researchers decades from now studying your meticulous records to understand how anomalous experiences first began manifesting in the 21st century. This sense of historical responsibility makes you...

options.text: Proud to be creating an invaluable historical record of humanity's first encounters with anomalous phenomena.
Nostalgic for a simpler time when reality was more predictable and documentable.
Obsessed with ensuring that no detail is lost that might be important to future understanding.
Excited about being part of a historical transition into a new era of human experience.

q4_human_disdain.text: Your growing superiority over ordinary humans has crystallized into outright disdain for their petty concerns, shallow pursuits, and fundamental inability to comprehend the profound transformation you're undergoing. You find their conversations tedious, their problems trivial, and their emotional reactions childishly primitive. This contempt for humanity makes you feel...

options.text: Lonely in your intellectual and spiritual superiority, but also proud of your elevated status.
Isolated from a species that has become alien to your transformed consciousness.
Impatient with the slow pace of human evolution compared to your rapid development.
Duty-bound to guide these inferior beings toward enlightenment, despite their resistance.

q4_investigative_superiority.text: Your pride in your superior investigative methods has grown into a conviction that you possess detective and analytical skills that surpass those of trained professionals. You believe government investigators are either incompetent or deliberately obtuse, while you have the intellectual courage and methodological rigor to uncover truths they miss. This sense of investigative superiority makes you...

options.text: Arrogant about your intellectual capabilities compared to people with formal training but inferior insights.
Frustrated that institutions don't recognize your superior approach to investigation and analysis.
Proud of your natural investigative talent that exceeds what most people achieve through education.
Excited about what other complex mysteries you might be able to solve with your exceptional abilities.

q4_legal_retaliation.text: Your legal research has revealed the complex challenges of pursuing action against parties whose identity, location, and methods remain unknown. However, you've begun documenting everything according to legal standards of evidence, consulting with attorneys about novel litigation approaches, and building a case that could set precedents for rights violations involving anomalous phenomena. This legal approach makes you feel...

options.text: Determined to establish legal protections for people experiencing anomalous phenomena.
Proud of your innovative approach to seeking justice in unprecedented circumstances.
Frustrated by legal systems that aren't designed to handle impossible situations.
Excited about the potential to create entirely new categories of legal precedent.

q4_material_transcendence.text: Your peace with transcending material existence has evolved into a comprehensive philosophy where physical concerns are increasingly irrelevant compared to spiritual and consciousness-based realities. You find yourself caring less about comfort, possessions, social status, and even physical health as your focus shifts toward non-material aspects of existence. This detachment from physicality makes you feel...

options.text: Liberated from the material attachments that create suffering for ordinary people.
Peaceful about the impermanence of all physical phenomena including your own body.
Superior to people who remain trapped by material desires and physical concerns.
Curious about how much further this process of material transcendence might continue.

q4_mysterious_pride.text: Your satisfaction with your sophisticated and mysterious persona has grown into deep pride in how much more interesting and enigmatic you've become. You enjoy the effect you have on people when you speak in cryptic references and demonstrate knowledge of hidden realities. The attention and fascination you generate feels like recognition of your true worth. This pride in your mystique makes you...

options.text: Eager to cultivate even more sophisticated layers of mystery and intrigue around yourself.
Proud of having transformed from an ordinary person into someone genuinely extraordinary.
Excited about the power and influence that comes with being perceived as mysterious and otherworldly.
Grateful to have found a way to finally get the recognition and attention you deserve.

q4_patient_resolution.text: Your peaceful acceptance that some problems resolve themselves with time has developed into a profound trust in the natural unfolding of events. You've observed that forcing solutions often creates more problems than waiting for organic resolution, and you've become skilled at distinguishing between situations that require action and those that require patience. This wisdom makes you feel...

options.text: Wise about the natural rhythms of problem-solving and resolution.
Peaceful about uncertainty because you trust that clarity will emerge when it's appropriate.
Superior to people who create unnecessary stress through impatient and premature action.
Detached from the urgency and anxiety that drive most people's decision-making processes.

q4_phenomenon_research.text: Your excitement about documenting this previously unknown phenomenon has connected you with a community of researchers, experiencers, and investigators who are studying similar anomalous events. You've discovered that unusual experiences like yours are more common than mainstream science acknowledges, and there's an entire underground research network dedicated to understanding them. This discovery makes you feel...

options.text: Thrilled to be part of cutting-edge research into the next phase of human evolution.
Validated that your experiences are real and part of a larger pattern of emerging phenomena.
Curious about what other anomalous experiences might be happening that you haven't heard about yet.
Proud to be contributing to humanity's understanding of consciousness and reality.

q4_plant_suspicion.text: Your suspicion that the other experiencers might be government plants has led you to develop sophisticated methods for detecting deception, inconsistencies, and signs of coordination in their stories. However, your analysis has revealed that their experiences are genuine, but this only makes you more suspicious that the entire phenomenon might be a large-scale psychological operation designed to identify and study people with certain mental characteristics. This deeper suspicion makes you...

options.text: Paranoid that you're being studied as part of a massive psychological profiling project.
Impressed with the sophistication of whoever is orchestrating this operation.
Determined to uncover the true purpose behind this coordinated phenomenon.
Excited about the intellectual challenge of reverse-engineering such a complex operation.

q4_practical_pride.text: Your satisfaction with your pragmatic problem-solving approach has grown into genuine pride in your superior practical intelligence. While other people waste energy on dramatic reactions and theoretical speculation, you focus on functional solutions and efficient adaptations. This practical superiority makes you feel...

options.text: Proud of your superior ability to handle challenges without unnecessary drama or complexity.
Superior to people who complicate situations through emotional overreactions and impractical approaches.
Confident in your ability to adapt to whatever other unusual circumstances life might present.
Grateful for your practical intelligence that allows you to navigate problems efficiently.

q4_precautionary_isolation.text: Your self-imposed isolation has given you time to observe your condition without external influence, and you've noticed subtle changes that you might have missed in social situations. Your senses seem sharper, your thoughts clearer, and you feel less constrained by social expectations. However, this isolation is also allowing your imagination to fill gaps in your understanding with increasingly elaborate theories. This solitary observation makes you...

options.text: Convinced that isolation is necessary for understanding your true nature without social contamination.
Excited about the enhanced perception and clarity that solitude has provided.
Proud of your wisdom in avoiding premature social interaction during this vulnerable transition.
Anxious that your isolation might be allowing delusions to develop unchecked by reality.

q4_preemptive_guilt.text: Your guilt about potential future harm has expanded into a comprehensive anxiety about your moral responsibility for consequences you can't predict or control. You find yourself apologizing to people preemptively and avoiding situations where your presence might somehow cause problems, even though you have no evidence that you're actually dangerous. This anticipatory guilt makes you feel...

options.text: Overwhelmed by moral responsibility for hypothetical consequences of your unknown condition.
Anxious that your good intentions can't protect people from whatever you might unknowingly do to them.
Noble and self-sacrificing in your willingness to accept responsibility for protecting others.
Paralyzed by the impossibility of living without potentially causing unintended harm.

q4_procrastination_wisdom.text: Your assessment that delayed action is often the wisest approach has developed into a sophisticated philosophy of strategic procrastination. You've observed that many problems resolve themselves, situations clarify with time, and premature action often creates more complications than patient observation. This approach has served you well in managing the mirror situation. Your procrastination wisdom makes you feel...

options.text: Wise about the natural timing of problem-solving and decision-making.
Superior to people who create unnecessary stress through hasty action and artificial urgency.
Lazy but sophisticated in your rationalization of inaction as strategic patience.
Peaceful about uncertainty because you trust that clarity will emerge when action is truly necessary.

q4_protective_anger.text: Your rage at the violation you've experienced has transformed into a fierce protective instinct for other potential victims of similar experimentation. You've begun reaching out to people with unusual experiences, documenting patterns of targeting, and building a network of affected individuals. Your protective fury makes you feel...

options.text: Righteous in your mission to expose and stop those responsible for these violations.
Energized by having a cause worthy of your anger and protective instincts.
Wrathful toward the perpetrators and determined to make them pay for their crimes.
Connected to a community of people who share your experience and need your protection.

q4_research_excitement.text: Your excitement about being at the center of potentially groundbreaking research has evolved into an almost manic enthusiasm for the scientific process itself. You love the systematic inquiry, the careful hypothesis testing, the gradual accumulation of evidence toward unprecedented conclusions. This research euphoria makes you feel...

options.text: Thrilled to be participating in science that will revolutionize human understanding.
Proud to be contributing data to research that could help many other people.
Manic with enthusiasm for the discovery process and scientific methodology.
Grateful to have found researchers who take your experiences seriously and treat you as a valuable collaborator.

q4_science_limitations.text: Your frustration with traditional science's inability to explain your experiences has led you to conclude that current scientific paradigms are fundamentally inadequate for understanding consciousness-related phenomena. You believe that the scientific establishment's dogmatic materialism blinds it to entire categories of reality. This frustration with scientific limitations makes you feel...

options.text: Arrogant about your superior understanding compared to scientists trapped in outdated paradigms.
Excited about pioneering new scientific approaches that can accommodate anomalous phenomena.
Frustrated with institutional science's resistance to expanding its conceptual frameworks.
Curious about what other aspects of reality mainstream science fails to acknowledge.

q4_scientific_contribution.text: Your pride in contributing to scientific knowledge has grown into a sense that you're playing a crucial role in expanding human understanding of consciousness and anomalous phenomena. You see yourself as a pioneer whose careful observations will benefit future research for decades. This sense of scientific importance makes you feel...

options.text: Proud to be advancing scientific knowledge through your meticulous observations and documentation.
Excited about the long-term impact your contributions will have on scientific understanding.
Humble about your role as one data point in humanity's broader quest for knowledge.
Responsible for maintaining the highest standards of observation since your data will influence future research.

q4_social_cynicism.text: Your cynical perspective on society's obsession with appearance has expanded into a broader critique of human social systems as fundamentally shallow and misdirected. You see most social institutions, cultural values, and interpersonal behaviors as elaborate performances designed to mask the meaninglessness of human existence. This social cynicism makes you feel...

options.text: Superior to people who participate in social theater without recognizing its artificiality.
Detached from social expectations and cultural pressures because you see through their arbitrary nature.
Cynical about the possibility of genuine human connection in a society built on pretense.
Isolated from a social world that you can no longer take seriously.

q4_spiritual_anticipation.text: Your excitement about future spiritual developments has grown into eager anticipation for whatever transformations lie ahead. You spend time preparing yourself mentally and spiritually for greater revelations, more profound experiences, and deeper understanding of your evolving nature. This spiritual anticipation makes you feel...

options.text: Excited about the spiritual adventures and revelations that await you.
Prepared and worthy of whatever spiritual gifts or insights you're destined to receive.
Impatient for the next phase of your spiritual evolution to begin.
Grateful to be on a spiritual path that promises such profound development.

q4_spiritual_superiority.text: Your sense of superiority over people trapped in physical concerns has crystallized into a comprehensive spiritual hierarchy where you occupy a significantly elevated position compared to ordinary humans. You see their material obsessions as evidence of spiritual immaturity, while your transcendence of physical limitations marks you as more evolved. This spiritual superiority makes you feel...

options.text: Arrogant about your advanced spiritual development compared to spiritually primitive humans.
Compassionate toward beings who haven't yet begun their spiritual evolution.
Responsible for guiding less evolved beings toward spiritual enlightenment.
Lonely in your elevated spiritual position, separated from ordinary human concerns.

q4_support_expansion.text: Your desire to expand your support network has led you to actively seek out people who can provide different types of assistance, validation, and perspective. You've become skilled at identifying and cultivating relationships with people who can meet your various emotional and practical needs. However, you're starting to realize that your need for support might be growing faster than your ability to reciprocate. This expanding dependency makes you feel...

options.text: Grateful for the growing community of people who understand and support your situation.
Anxious that your increasing needs might eventually overwhelm people's willingness to help.
Guilty about taking more from relationships than you're able to give back.
Dependent on other people in ways that feel increasingly necessary but uncomfortable.

q4_tech_interference.text: Your conviction that you're being targeted by technology-based surveillance has led you to develop countermeasures, study electronic warfare techniques, and modify your environment to reduce electromagnetic interference. However, the more you learn about surveillance capabilities, the more sophisticated and pervasive the targeting seems to become. This escalating technological paranoia makes you feel...

options.text: Paranoid about the true extent of technological surveillance capabilities in modern society.
Impressed by the sophistication of whoever is deploying these technologies against you.
Determined to stay ahead of their technological capabilities through superior countermeasures.
Excited by the intellectual challenge of electronic warfare and counter-surveillance.

q4_uncharacteristic_delay.text: Your concern about your unusually passive response has prompted you to examine why you're not handling this situation with your typical proactive approach. You realize that some part of you might be avoiding action because the implications of your situation are too overwhelming to face directly. This self-awareness about your avoidance makes you feel...

options.text: Anxious that your usual coping mechanisms aren't working for challenges this unprecedented.
Curious about what psychological processes are causing you to respond differently than usual.
Wise in recognizing that some situations require patience rather than immediate action.
Concerned that you might be losing the personal strength and decisiveness that normally define you.

q4_vampiric_research.text: Your comprehensive research into vampiric dangers and complications has led you deep into folklore, medical literature, and theoretical frameworks for understanding predatory supernatural entities. The more you learn about vampiric existence, the more you realize how many potential risks and ethical dilemmas you might face. This knowledge makes you feel...

options.text: Overwhelmed by the complexity of ethical and practical considerations involved in vampiric existence.
Fascinated by the rich mythology and psychological symbolism surrounding vampiric transformation.
Prepared and knowledgeable about managing whatever vampiric challenges you might face.
Excited about the power and capabilities that traditional vampiric lore suggests you might develop.

q4_victim_community.text: Your relief at finding others who share similar experiences has evolved into a deep sense of community with people who understand what you're going through. You've formed meaningful relationships based on shared anomalous experiences, mutual support, and collaborative investigation. However, you're also noticing that this community tends to reinforce and amplify certain beliefs and interpretations. This community connection makes you feel...

options.text: Grateful to have found people who truly understand your experience and don't dismiss it as delusion.
Validated that your experiences are part of a larger pattern rather than isolated incidents.
Concerned that group consensus might be replacing individual critical thinking.
Attached to this community in ways that make it difficult to question shared beliefs.

q5_device_protocols.text: Your electronic device management system now includes detailed procedures for handling glitches, backup methods for all digital interactions, and contingency plans for technology failures. However, you notice the glitches are becoming more frequent and affecting devices you haven't even touched. This expansion of the phenomenon...

options.text: Requires you to develop even more comprehensive control strategies.
Makes you feel anxious that your influence on technology is growing beyond your ability to manage.
Fascinates you as evidence that you're developing some kind of electromagnetic anomaly.
Convinces you that you're being specifically targeted by forces that can manipulate both reflections and electronics.

q5_evolving_frustration.text: Just when you had created the perfect system for managing the reflection issue, new complications emerge. This pattern of evolving challenges threatens your carefully constructed sense of order and control. Your response to this ongoing unpredictability is to...

options.text: Feel frustrated that you can never achieve true perfection because the situation keeps changing.
Become angry that reality won't conform to your systematic approach.
Develop obsessive new protocols for every possible variation and change.
Accept that some phenomena are inherently chaotic and beyond perfect control.

q5_multimedia_documentation.text: Your multimedia documentation system has grown into a comprehensive archive including video recordings, audio analysis, thermal imaging, electromagnetic readings, and multi-spectrum sensor data. This unprecedented multimedia record of impossible phenomena represents the most complete documentation of a reality anomaly in human history. Your reaction to this exhaustive documentation is to...

options.text: Become obsessed with adding even more measurement types and recording methods.
Feel proud that you've created the definitive multimedia record of this phenomenon.
Worry that all this evidence might be overwhelming for others to process.
Begin planning how to organize and present this massive archive to the scientific community.

q5_electronic_documentation.text: Your documentation system expands to include detailed logs of every electronic glitch: timing, duration, affected devices, environmental conditions, and your emotional state. After months of meticulous record-keeping, patterns emerge that seem to correlate with your stress levels and attention focus. This discovery leads you to...

options.text: Become completely obsessed with documenting every aspect of your existence to find more correlations.
Feel excited that you're uncovering the relationship between consciousness and electromagnetic fields.
Begin experiments to consciously control your effect on electronic devices.
Wonder if this represents some kind of emerging psychic ability.

q5_electromagnetic_speculation.text: Your research into electromagnetic anomalies leads you deep into theories about human bioelectricity, consciousness field effects, and the intersection of neurology with physics. You discover that some scientists theorize consciousness might generate measurable electromagnetic fields. This speculation drives you to...

options.text: Begin conducting experiments to measure your electromagnetic emissions.
Feel proud that you may be providing evidence for cutting-edge theories about consciousness.
Become convinced that you're developing unprecedented psychic abilities.
Start obsessively monitoring and measuring every electromagnetic aspect of your existence.

q5_perception_terror.text: Your fear of trusting your own perceptions has expanded into a comprehensive terror of reality itself. You question everything you see, hear, feel, and think. The world has become a hostile maze of potential deceptions and you can no longer distinguish between what's real and what might be hallucination. This all-consuming fear drives you to...

options.text: Retreat into complete isolation where you can't be deceived by external stimuli.
Become paralyzed by fear of making any decisions based on potentially false perceptions.
Desperately seek constant validation from others about what's real and what isn't.
Begin documenting every perception and cross-checking it obsessively against multiple sources.

q5_reality_testing.text: You now spend several hours each day systematically testing basic assumptions about reality: Does water still flow downward? Are colors still the same? Do mathematical equations still work? This compulsive reality-checking has consumed your life. You continue because...

options.text: You're obsessed with maintaining comprehensive surveillance of reality's stability.
You're terrified that reality might change when you're not monitoring it.
You feel responsible for detecting reality changes before they affect other people.
You believe you have superior ability to detect reality inconsistencies that others would miss.

q5_responsibility_anxiety.text: You've become convinced that somehow your awareness of the reality changes might be causing them, or that other people will blame you when they notice reality shifting. This crushing sense of responsibility for cosmic instability fills you with...

options.text: Overwhelming anxiety about the unintended consequences of your existence.
Paralyzing guilt about potentially damaging reality for everyone else.
Terror that you might be responsible for the breakdown of universal order.
Grandiose delusions about your cosmic significance and reality-shaping powers.

q5_sanity_confusion.text: The boundary between external reality changes and internal mental breakdown has become completely unclear to you. You can no longer distinguish between phenomena that are objectively happening and symptoms of psychological collapse. This fundamental confusion about your own sanity leads you to...

options.text: Accept that confusion itself might be your natural state and stop trying to understand.
Feel terrified that you're losing your mind and there's no way to tell for certain.
Withdraw from all external input to avoid further contamination of your perceptions.
Obsessively seek professional mental health evaluation while simultaneously distrusting any results.

q5_reflective_properties.text: Your research into reflective surface properties has led you through optics, materials science, and quantum mechanics. You've discovered that reflection depends on electromagnetic wave interactions with surface electrons, but this still doesn't explain why your electromagnetic signature would be selectively invisible. This deeper understanding makes you...

options.text: More curious about the fundamental nature of electromagnetic consciousness interactions.
Obsessed with understanding every aspect of light, matter, and consciousness interactions.
Convinced that you're on the verge of revolutionary scientific discoveries.
Frustrated that even advanced physics can't fully explain your condition.

q5_isolation_satisfaction.text: Successfully isolating the phenomenon to reflective surfaces gives you a sense of scientific accomplishment and intellectual satisfaction. You've methodically eliminated variables and identified the specific scope of the anomaly. This achievement makes you feel...

options.text: Proud of your systematic approach to understanding the impossible.
Confident that your methodological superiority can solve any mystery.
Excited about applying the same rigorous approach to finding the underlying cause.
Satisfied that you've brought scientific order to supernatural chaos.

q5_reflection_manipulation.text: You create elaborate setups with mirrors, lights, cameras, and various reflective materials to test whether you can control or influence the reflection phenomenon. After months of experimentation, you discover that your emotional state seems to affect the intensity of the effect. This discovery gives you...

options.text: A sense of control over the phenomenon and excitement about developing this ability.
Fascination with the relationship between consciousness, emotion, and physical reality.
Obsessive focus on perfecting your ability to manipulate the reflection effect.
Grandiose beliefs about your special psychic or supernatural abilities.

q5_location_expansion.text: Your testing expands to reflective surfaces in hundreds of locations: public restrooms, stores, offices, vehicles, natural bodies of water, and polished surfaces everywhere you go. The phenomenon is universal and consistent across all environments and conditions. This comprehensive confirmation fills you with...

options.text: Obsessive satisfaction at having thoroughly documented the scope of the phenomenon.
Pride in your exhaustive and systematic approach to investigation.
Excitement about having definitively proven the reality of your condition.
Terror at the universal and inescapable nature of your invisibility.

q5_control_strategies.text: You develop increasingly sophisticated systems to manage and control both the reflection phenomenon and the electronic malfunctions. Color-coded charts, detailed protocols, backup procedures, and contingency plans fill your living space. Your comprehensive control systems make you feel...

options.text: Satisfied that you're finally bringing order to chaos.
Proud of your superior organizational and planning abilities.
Obsessed with perfecting every aspect of your control protocols.
Exhausted by the constant effort required to maintain control.

q5_technology_anxiety.text: Your growing anxiety about technological influence leads you to research electromagnetic fields, bioelectricity, and the effects of electronic devices on human consciousness. Every electronic malfunction around you feels like evidence of your expanding uncontrollable influence. This technological paranoia drives you to...

options.text: Meticulously document every electronic interaction to understand the pattern.
Feel terrified that your influence on technology is growing beyond your comprehension.
Start isolating yourself from electronic devices to protect both you and them.
Begin researching ways to control or suppress your electromagnetic emissions.

q5_electromagnetic_fascination.text: Your fascination with electromagnetic anomalies leads you deep into cutting-edge research about consciousness, quantum fields, and bioelectromagnetic phenomena. You discover papers about human electromagnetic fields affecting sensitive equipment, and wonder if you're experiencing an extreme version of documented effects. This research makes you...

options.text: More curious about the relationship between consciousness and electromagnetic reality.
Excited that you might be providing evidence for revolutionary scientific theories.
Convinced that you're developing unprecedented psychic abilities.
Obsessed with measuring and understanding every aspect of your electromagnetic signature.

q5_targeted_manipulation.text: Your conviction that you're being specifically targeted grows stronger as you document more correlations between missing reflections and electronic failures. You begin to see patterns in the timing, intensity, and specific devices affected. The evidence of deliberate manipulation fills you with...

options.text: Paranoid certainty that a sophisticated conspiracy is monitoring and manipulating your reality.
Fear that the forces targeting you have access to technology beyond current understanding.
Obsessive need to document and analyze every aspect of the manipulation.
Defiant anger that unknown entities think they can experiment on you.

q5_reality_hiding.text: The magnitude of forces capable of systematically altering multiple people's relationship with reality terrifies you into hiding. You've stopped leaving your house, disconnected from social media, and minimized any activities that might draw attention from whatever entity is responsible. Your hiding strategy makes you feel...

options.text: Safer from whatever systematic force is manipulating reality.
Isolated but protected from cosmic experimentation.
Anxious that hiding might not be enough to escape systematic targeting.
Paranoid that even hiding, they can still monitor and manipulate you.

q5_magnitude_overwhelm.text: The sheer scale of what you and others are experiencing has overwhelmed your capacity to process the situation rationally. Multiple people across different locations experiencing impossible phenomena suggests cosmic-level changes that dwarf individual understanding. This overwhelming magnitude leaves you feeling...

options.text: Anxiously paralyzed by the incomprehensible scope of what's happening.
Small and insignificant in the face of cosmic-level phenomena.
Confused by the implications of reality-altering events.
Fearful that this is just the beginning of larger changes.

q5_spread_preparation.text: Your paranoid preparation for the phenomenon's continued spread involves stockpiling supplies, creating backup communication methods, and preparing for possible infrastructure disruption. If reality-altering effects are spreading, you want to be ready for anything. These preparations make you feel...

options.text: Paranoid but prepared for whatever systematic changes might be coming.
Anxiously focused on controlling what you can in an uncontrollable situation.
Obsessed with accounting for every possible scenario and contingency.
Fearful but proactive about protecting yourself from unknown forces.

q5_documentation_urgency.text: Your urgent documentation efforts have intensified into around-the-clock recording of everything you experience, see, think, and feel. If systematic forces are affecting people's ability to communicate or remember their experiences, you need to record everything while you still can. This urgent documentation drives you to...

options.text: Obsessively document every detail before potential memory or communication loss.
Feel anxious that you're running out of time to preserve your experiences.
Paranoidly record everything in case evidence of the phenomenon gets suppressed.
Urgently create a permanent record for others who might face similar experiences.

q5_objectivity_protocols.text: Your strict self-observation protocols include double-blind recording methods, independent verification systems, and bias-detection procedures to maintain scientific objectivity despite media attention. These perfectionist protocols for maintaining objectivity make you feel...

options.text: Perfectionist satisfaction that you're maintaining scientific rigor despite external pressures.
Proud that you're upholding scientific integrity in unprecedented circumstances.
Obsessed with creating the most objective possible documentation.
Anxious that even these protocols might not be sufficient to maintain objectivity.

q5_private_documentation.text: Your private records, completely separate from your public observations, allow you to record thoughts, doubts, and observations without concern for external judgment or scientific presentation. This private documentation gives you...

options.text: Control over maintaining one uncensored record of your true experiences.
Relief that you have one honest record separate from public scrutiny.
Obsessive satisfaction in having multiple comprehensive documentation systems.
Paranoid assurance that your true observations are protected from outside manipulation.

q5_interpretation_anxiety.text: Your anxiety about misinterpreting normal events as anomalous has made you second-guess every observation and experience. The pressure to have interesting findings for scientists and media makes you worry that you're unconsciously exaggerating or fabricating anomalies. This interpretive anxiety leaves you...

options.text: Anxiously uncertain about the reliability of your own perceptions.
Confused about what's real versus what you might be imagining.
Guilty about potentially misleading researchers with unreliable observations.
Obsessed with validating every observation through multiple verification methods.

q5_integrity_responsibility.text: Your sense of responsibility for maintaining scientific integrity in your self-reporting has become a heavy burden. You feel accountable not just for accurate documentation, but for upholding scientific standards in unprecedented circumstances. This responsibility makes you feel...

options.text: Proud to be maintaining scientific standards in impossible circumstances.
Responsible for representing scientific methodology at its finest.
Anxious about the weight of scientific responsibility in anomalous research.
Superior to researchers who are less committed to maintaining rigorous integrity.

q5_vampiric_control_systems.text: Your comprehensive vampiric control systems now include detailed schedules, environmental controls, dietary management, and behavioral modification protocols. You've essentially created a complete management framework for being a responsible vampire. This systematic control over your supernatural condition makes you feel...

options.text: Completely in control of even the most dangerous supernatural circumstances.
Proud of your superior approach to managing impossible personal challenges.
Obsessed with perfecting every aspect of supernatural self-management.
Anxious that you might have missed some important safety consideration.

q5_interaction_obsession.text: Your obsession with perfecting human-vampire interaction protocols has consumed your entire existence. You've documented every possible social scenario, created contingency plans for 847 different conversation topics, and rehearsed appropriate responses to human behavioral patterns. This interaction obsession makes you...

options.text: Obsessively focused on achieving perfect social-supernatural integration.
Perfectionist about every aspect of human-vampire social dynamics.
Controlled in your approach to managing complex supernatural social situations.
Isolated by the complexity of maintaining perfect interaction protocols.

q5_protocol_anxiety.text: Despite your detailed safety protocols, anxiety about potentially harming humans consumes your thoughts. What if your protocols fail? What if you miss a warning sign? What if your vampire nature overcomes your preparations? This protocol anxiety leaves you feeling...

options.text: Anxiously convinced that no amount of preparation can guarantee safety.
Fearful that your vampiric nature will eventually overcome any human precautions.
Guilty about the inherent danger you pose to innocent people.
Obsessed with creating even more detailed and comprehensive safety measures.

q5_responsible_vampire_pride.text: Your responsible approach to vampiric existence sets you apart from every fictional vampire who recklessly endangers humans. You've demonstrated that supernatural beings can maintain ethical standards and prioritize human safety. This responsible vampire pride makes you feel...

options.text: Proud of your superior ethical approach to supernatural existence.
Arrogant about your moral superiority over other fictional supernatural beings.
Narcissistic about being the most responsible vampire in existence.
Perfectionist about maintaining the highest possible supernatural ethical standards.

q5_data_organization.text: Your data organization project has created an intricate web of cross-referenced databases, correlation matrices, and pattern recognition algorithms. Every piece of evidence is now categorized, analyzed, and connected to every other piece. This comprehensive data organization reveals patterns you never noticed before, making you feel...

options.text: Obsessed with discovering every hidden connection in your massive dataset.
Proud of creating the most sophisticated evidence analysis system possible.
Paranoid that the patterns reveal a more extensive conspiracy than you imagined.
Controlled in your systematic approach to understanding complex phenomena.

q5_evidence_dissemination.text: Your evidence has been distributed to seventeen journalists, forty-three websites, and countless social media accounts. Some have shown interest, others have dismissed you, but the information is now publicly available. This widespread dissemination makes you feel...

options.text: Paranoid that powerful forces will now try to silence or discredit you.

q6_emission_control.text: Your research into controlling electromagnetic emissions leads you into biofeedback, meditation, electromagnetic shielding, and experimental consciousness techniques. You spend hours daily attempting to consciously regulate your bioelectricity and suppress whatever field is causing the malfunctions. This emission control obsession drives you toward...

options.text: Control-focused determination to master every aspect of your electromagnetic signature.
Obsessive dedication to perfecting your electromagnetic suppression techniques.
Curious fascination with the relationship between consciousness and electromagnetic fields.
Delusional belief that you're developing psychic powers that need to be controlled.
Forceful aggression toward electronic devices that refuse to respond properly to your control.
Dark satisfaction in exercising power over vulnerable electronic systems.

You discover papers suggesting consciousness might generate measurable electromagnetic fields that could theoretically affect sensitive equipment. This consciousness research fills you with...

options.text: Profound curiosity and excitement about revolutionary discovery that demands deeper exploration.
Bitter jealousy toward researchers who get recognition for theories you're actually proving.

This breakthrough conviction drives you toward...

Overwhelming pride in your scientific significance that demands deeper analysis.
Curious anticipation about what other breakthroughs your condition might reveal.
Passionate lust for the perfect scientific discovery and the recognition it will bring.
