options.text: Delusional excitement and curious fascination that demands deeper exploration of your discovery.
Narcissistic pride in being among the first humans to evolve beyond normal limitations.
Voracious hunger to consume and absorb every aspect of your psychic development.

Curious fascination with the complex electromagnetic patterns you're discovering.
Control-focused determination to understand and regulate every aspect of your electromagnetic emissions.

q6_conspiracy_certainty.text: Your analysis of the timing patterns, electronic correlations, and reflection anomalies has convinced you beyond doubt that a sophisticated conspiracy is monitoring and manipulating your reality. The evidence is overwhelming, undeniable, and terrifying. This conspiracy certainty fills you with...

options.text: Paranoid determination that demands deeper analysis of who you can trust.
Anger that unknown entities think they can experiment on you without consent.

q6_advanced_technology_fear.text: Your fear has evolved beyond simple paranoia into terror of advanced technology that exceeds human understanding. Whatever forces are manipulating your reflections and electronics have capabilities that suggest non-human intelligence or technology from far in the future. This advanced technology fear paralyzes you with...

options.text: Terror that demands deeper analysis of your fundamental fear response.
Paranoid certainty that advanced entities are using you for incomprehensible experiments.
Despair that humanity is completely outmatched by these superior forces.

q6_manipulation_analysis.text: Your analysis of the manipulation has become incredibly sophisticated. Detailed timing charts, correlation matrices, pattern recognition algorithms, and predictive models fill your research. You've documented manipulation patterns with scientific precision that would be impressive if it weren't so terrifying. This manipulation analysis drives you toward...

Perfectionist pride in creating the most comprehensive analysis of reality manipulation ever.
Fear that your detailed documentation makes you an even bigger target for manipulation.

q6_experimental_rage.text: Your anger at being subjected to unknown experiments has evolved into cosmic rage. How dare these entities treat you like a laboratory specimen! q7_fear_response_analysis.text: In the depths of your psychological transformation, you discover that reality's fabric is unraveling around you. Each day brings new impossibilities that challenge your understanding of existence. The very ground beneath your feet whispers of cosmic horrors yet to come. Your deepest fear in this situation is...

options.text: That you're losing your grip on sanity and can no longer distinguish between real and imagined threats.
That everyone around you will discover how fundamentally broken and wrong you are.
That the constant dread gnawing at your mind will eventually consume you entirely.
That this is all happening exactly as it's supposed to, and there's nothing special about your suffering.
That no matter what you do, everything will inevitably spiral into cosmic catastrophe.

q7_pride_manifestation.text: As reality bends to accommodate your unique existence, you realize that you have transcended the limitations that constrain ordinary minds. Your consciousness operates on frequencies that lesser beings cannot comprehend. This revelation of your exceptional nature fills you with the conviction that...

options.text: You are clearly the chosen herald of a new cosmic order that only you can understand and guide.
Your intellectual superiority makes you naturally qualified to reshape reality according to better principles.
You are obviously the main character of existence, and all of reality exists primarily to serve your narrative.

q7_obsession_focus.text: The anomalous phenomena surrounding your existence have revealed that reality operates according to hidden patterns that only you can perceive. These patterns must be understood, controlled, and perfected if you are to maintain any sense of stability. Your primary compulsion is to...

Establish rigid protocols and procedures that will allow you to predict and manage every aspect of your new reality.
Achieve mathematical precision in documenting these phenomena because any imperfection could invalidate your entire understanding.

Adapt your behavior to match whatever patterns emerge, ensuring you never stand out or disrupt the natural order.

Thrilled to be the first human to witness the universe revealing its most carefully guarded secrets.
Certain that you have been chosen to receive divine revelations that will transform human understanding forever.

Every 'random' event, every 'coincidence,' every person who has entered your life has been carefully placed by entities with inscrutable agendas. Your primary concern is...

That these manipulative forces must be fought with every fiber of your being, regardless of the consequences.
That you must rebel against these controlling forces and help others break free from their manipulation.

q7_isolation_choice.text: Your transformation has revealed the profound emptiness underlying all human connections. Every relationship, every social bond, every attempt at intimacy is revealed as a desperate performance by beings too shallow to understand the cosmic insignificance of their existence. This revelation leads you to embrace...

options.text: Complete isolation from the meaningless social theater that occupies ordinary people's lives.
Emotional detachment from all human concerns because they are ultimately irrelevant to cosmic truth.
Total apathy toward human suffering and joy because both are equally pointless in the grand scheme.
Philosophical indifference to whether humanity succeeds, fails, or disappears entirely.
